jobs_results.title: Senior Application Engineer (iOS)
jobs_results.description:
Paf have recently released the first version of their application, a journey they only just started, with a lot of work to be done ahead. We are helping them find a skilled iOS developer who wants to join them on that journey. Is that you?

OFFER
As a developer at Paf, you will work in a close-knit team with colleagues who share a passion for delivering top-quality products, enabling great gaming experiences for a global and diverse audience.

Paf is different from other game companies on the market. They strive for a long-term sustainable business and care about their employees, customers, and society; All profit goes to charity.

What's in it for you as an employee?
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours to make your everyday life easier.
‚Ä¢ Generous terms regarding pensions, wellness, and free healthcare.
‚Ä¢ They avoid overtime; you staying with them for 10 years is more important than short-term business goals.
‚Ä¢ Permission to work abroad 3 months per year
‚Ä¢ They adjust to where you want to work: 100% at the office, 100% remote work, or a mix where you‚Äôre at the office a few days a week. You will be given a desk, screens, and docking station for your home office and if you want to mix, you will be given a double set of equipment to have the same conditions at home and at the office.

THE TEAM & PRODUCT
The team you'll be joining develops and maintains several apps for both iOS and Android. These apps operate across various markets and brands. The team is responsible for the entire stack, from app development to the underlying infrastructure in AWS.

You will enter the product in an early stage that will continue to be developed for a long time ahead ‚Äì granting you a lot of freedom to set the frames with the team, working with both improvement and innovation.

Check their tech-radar out to see which technologies are coming, which they use, and which they are phasing out.

YOUR ROLE
You will focus on the iOS application where you will be engaged in the entire development process, from requirement specification, story creation, and estimation to development, testing, release, and maintenance.

You are expected to have a deep understanding of the platform to be able to recommend changes in architecture and grasp their long-term implications.

WHO YOU ARE
The team today is characterized by an open-minded atmosphere where everyone is welcome and involved in the process. Therefore, we are looking for someone who easily engages with others and values working in a team to achieve common goals. Being super skilled as a developer is one thing, but you‚Äôre also humble and open to learning new things.

Seen to the technical aspects of the role, you should have:
‚Ä¢ + 5 years of experience with iOS development
‚Ä¢ Working experience with Swift and Swift UI
‚Ä¢ Some experienceor interest in working with Swift concurrency

Additional skill sets that will be interesting to Paf:
‚Ä¢ TypeScript
‚Ä¢ AWS or other cloud platforms.

They don‚Äôt look too much at formal education and diplomas, a lot can be compensated with:
‚Ä¢ Good communication skills
‚Ä¢ Track record as a team player
‚Ä¢ Independence
‚Ä¢ Accountability
‚Ä¢ Experience and knowledge

MORE ABOUT PAF
Paf is a Nordic gaming company founded in √Öland in 1966 to generate profit for the benefit of society. They were one of the first gaming companies to go online in 1999. Many of their games are exclusive to Paf and developed by their in-house Games Studio. They are an award-winning industry leader in responsible gaming. Their physical gaming operations include over 30 cruise ships crisscrossing the Baltic and North Seas.

Paf has roughly 330 employees representing 29 nationalities, with offices located on √Öland, Helsinki, Stockholm, Riga, Tallinn, Oslo, Norrk√∂ping, Gzira, and Madrid. Paf (√Ölands Penningautomatf√∂rening) is licensed and controlled by the Government of √Öland.

In 2021, the Paf Group had a total turnover of 135 million euros and a profit of 34.3 million euros. More information at aboutpaf.com

ABOUT PINETREE
At Pinetree, we have a vision and mission to differentiate ourselves from the crowd and are Sweden's contenders in talent search and matching.

By working as an agency, the value to you as an employee is that we have a very wide network of partner companies that we continuously ensure their high-quality standards.

This recruitment is direct employment at Paf, and all applications, questions, and administration, are managed by Pinetree AB.

Om f√∂retaget:
Pinetree

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Developer (Cross-Platform)
jobs_results.description:
About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with the opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. üôÇ

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior cross-platform Mobile Developer for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in developing cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and React Native frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Strong proficiency in Dart and JavaScript programming languages.
‚Ä¢ Experience with native mobile development (iOS/Android) is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of mobile UI/UX design principles and best practices.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Lead the development of cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and React Native frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with designers and product managers to translate design mockups and user stories into responsive, high-performance mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while adhering to best practices and coding standards.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to junior developers to ensure code quality and consistency.
‚Ä¢ Optimise mobile applications for maximum performance across a variety of devices and platforms.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and debug issues to ensure smooth operation of mobile applications.

What Proxify offers
‚Ä¢ Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
‚Ä¢ Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
‚Ä¢ Fast-track your independent developer career
Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
‚Ä¢ A recruitment process that values your time
Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

jobs_results.title: Senior Application Engineer (iOS)

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Intermediate/Senior Software Engineer (iOS, Android, React, React Native, TypeScript, Fullstack)
jobs_results.description:
We are building something new and exciting at Qapital! To help us build this, we are looking for iOS, Android, Fullstack, and other software developers to join a founding team of startup-minded individuals that will lay the groundwork for our new fintech offering.

This team will play a pivotal role in spearheading innovation. As such, you will have the opportunity to shape the early architecture and design of the product, and set the trajectory for its future direction. If you‚Äôre looking for a challenging and rewarding role where your decisions will make a profound impact on the product‚Äôs success - this team is for you.

Key responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement robust, scalable software solutions.
‚Ä¢ Lead the development of new modules and modify/maintain existing modules as needed, driving innovation and pushing the boundaries of what's possible.
‚Ä¢ Architect and optimize systems for performance, reliability, and maintainability.
‚Ä¢ Ensure seamless integration with external systems.
‚Ä¢ Actively participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to enhance code quality.

Minimum qualifications:
‚Ä¢ At least 3+ years of experience working with one or more of the following depending on the role you are applying for:
‚Ä¢ iOS Engineers: Swift/Swift UI - familiar with SwiftUI APIs for Views, Swift Concurrency, SwiftTesting
‚Ä¢ Android Engineers: Java/Kotlin - familiar with State Flow, Jetpack Compose
‚Ä¢ Fullstack React/TypeScript Engineers: Fullstack TypeScript/Node.js and React.js / React Native (fullstack)
‚Ä¢ Frontend React/RN Engineers: React.js / React Native TypeScript (frontend)
‚Ä¢ Backend TypeScript/C# Engineers: TypeScript/Node.js and C# (backend)
‚Ä¢ Backend Kotlin/TypeScript Engineers: TypeScript/Node.js and Java/Kotlin (backend)
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Preferred qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Worked in more than one area across the technologies listed above
‚Ä¢ Experience building developer-facing/B2B APIs/SDKs
‚Ä¢ Worked at startups and/or fintech companies
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with AWS

Location: Remote (Global, Preferred: Canada, India, Sweden) or Hybrid (Stockhom, Sweden)

We are a distributed team with teammates across the globe. A majority of our product and engineering teams are located in Canada, Sweden, and the US, with others in India and Singapore. We currently have an office in Stockholm, Sweden for those who prefer having an option of being able to go into the office.

Why Join Us:
‚Ä¢ New Product Development Team: Be part of a pioneering team tasked with building something truly innovative from the ground up.
‚Ä¢ Career Growth Opportunities: As we continue to expand, you'll have the chance to take on leadership roles and help shape the future of our product.
‚Ä¢ Job Security: Joining a startup doesn't mean sacrificing stability. We offer a supportive environment where your contributions are valued and recognized.
‚Ä¢ Impactful Work: From defining product strategy to shaping the product's direction, your contributions will directly influence our success.
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Benefits: Enjoy competitive compensation, generous vacation time, and a comprehensive benefits package including health, dental, and life insurance.

If you're passionate about using technology to transform the way people manage their finances and thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment, we'd love to hear from you. Join us on this journey to revolutionize banking and empower individuals to achieve financial happiness.

Benefits:

Flexible Vacation, Dental, Extended Health Care, Counseling Services, Short-term Disability, Long-term Disability, Life Insurance, Survivor Benefit, Accidental Death and Dismemberment Insurance

jobs_results.title: Job Opening: iOS Engineer at Telavox in Malm√∂
jobs_results.description: We are looking for a talented and driven iOS Engineer to join our mobile team in Malm√∂. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone with a passion for mobile development, cutting-edge technology, and creating impactful solutions in the telecom industry. The salary is based on SCB:s latest salary statistics.

jobs_results.title: Frontend/Mobile developer - React Native
jobs_results.description:
Since our inception in 2017, Anyfin has empowered thousands across Sweden, Finland, Germany, and Norway to manage their finances better, saving millions through smart refinancing options. We‚Äôre growing rapidly and have big ambitions on the horizon, with new markets to explore and impactful products to launch. To fuel our mission, we‚Äôre seeking a dedicated and talented Mobile Developer who‚Äôs ready to create a powerful and intuitive mobile experience for our users.
What You Will Be Doing

As a Mobile Developer at Anyfin, you‚Äôll play an essential role in building and enhancing our mobile application where we see most of our current traffic. You will be delivering an intuitive and engaging experience for users on both iOS and Android as part of a fast-paced, collaborative team that thrives on pushing boundaries and driving growth. Here‚Äôs how you‚Äôll contribute:
‚Ä¢ Feature Development: Design, build, and maintain new features on the mobile app using React Native. You'll work to continuously enhance the user experience, ensuring smooth functionality and aesthetic appeal across iOS and Android platforms.
‚Ä¢ UI Implementation: Collaborate closely with our design team to bring pixel-perfect UIs to life, utilizing styled-components for visual consistency and Storybook for efficient component management.
‚Ä¢ API Integration: Integrate with our GraphQL API, ensuring that data is managed seamlessly within the app, fostering efficient client-server interactions that keep our app performing at its best.
‚Ä¢ Code Quality & Type Safety: Write well-structured, maintainable code with a strong focus on TypeScript for clarity and type safety, promoting a clean codebase and scalable solutions across the development lifecycle.
‚Ä¢ Experimentation & Growth: Partner with our product team to implement and track features through Growth Book experiments, helping optimize user engagement and continuously improving our mobile experience.
‚Ä¢ Testing & QA: Develop and maintain automated end-to-end tests to ensure stability and high-quality code delivery, allowing us to release with confidence and reliability.

Who You Are
‚Ä¢ Experienced in Mobile Development: You have a solid background in React Native development, especially for iOS and Android platforms, and can point to successful projects in a professional or personal capacity.
‚Ä¢ UI Enthusiast: You‚Äôre adept at implementing visually appealing UIs and have worked with styled-components and Storybook to maintain high standards of design fidelity.
‚Ä¢ API Savvy: You‚Äôre comfortable working with GraphQL APIs and managing complex client-server interactions to ensure a smooth user experience.
‚Ä¢ Committed to Code Quality: TypeScript and maintainable, well-documented code are second nature to you, and you‚Äôre proactive in maintaining best practices.
‚Ä¢ Data-Driven: You have an interest in experimentation and growth initiatives, using data insights to inform development and improve user engagement.
‚Ä¢ QA Mindset: You understand the importance of automated testing and have experience building and maintaining end-to-end test suites.

Why Join Us?

At Anyfin, you‚Äôll find a team driven by purpose, curiosity, and a shared ambition to make a difference. We promise a challenging and rewarding journey that will sharpen your skills, expand your creativity, and allow you to work on meaningful projects. Plus, enjoy the benefits of a centrally-located Stockholm office, competitive compensation, extra time off on your birthday, and many other perks we‚Äôll share when we meet!

Are you ready to help us revolutionize financial well-being for all?
Apply today, and let‚Äôs build something amazing together. We believe that innovation thrives in person, so we work from the office four days a week to foster collaboration and creativity.

Please note that we are not offering relocation support for this position.

jobs_results.title: Regular Android Application Developer
jobs_results.description:
Summary

Develop software for next-generation infotainment systems based on Android Automotive OS. Collaborate with Google and other teams to create a cohesive end-to-end solution. Participate in the full software development lifecycle (design, architecture, documentation, development, verification, validation). Stay current with industry trends. The role requires proactive problem-solving and collaboration within an Agile team. Responsibilities include developing software, collaborating with partners, and ensuring solutions are technologically advanced. The team values collaboration, integrity, innovation and excellence.

Must Have
‚Ä¢ M.Sc in Software Engineering or 5+ years experience
‚Ä¢ Android app development (Java/Kotlin)
‚Ä¢ AOSP & AOSP build system experience
‚Ä¢ Familiar with modern app architectures (MVP, MVVM)
‚Ä¢ Android testing frameworks (JUnit, Espresso, Mockito)
‚Ä¢ Proficient in Python scripting
‚Ä¢ Experience with Git

Good To Have
‚Ä¢ Automotive infotainment project experience
‚Ä¢ Swedish B driver's license

Project description

Support the customer‚Äôs objective to make all cars connected and provide a continuously enhanced experience for both new and existing cars.
You will be developing the next generation infotainment system based on Google's Android automotive OS.
The work is done in an Agile team with a warm atmosphere, a speak up culture and a place where everyone can be themselves. Collaboration is highly valued, and the team effort always comes before the individual.

You are proactive, adaptable, and always looking for ways to improve processes and outcomes. Above all, you are a team player who values integrity, innovation, and excellence.

Responsibilities

As an Android Application Developer, you will:

Develop software for the infotainment system.

Collaborate with partners like Google, UX designers, and other development teams to define a coherent end-to-end solution.

Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, including:

Design

Architecture

Documentation

Development

Verification

Validation

Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and best practices to ensure our solutions remain at the forefront of technology.

Skills

Must have

A M.Sc in Software Engineering or at least 5 years of relevant experience.

Hands-on experience in Android application development (Java/Kotlin).

Experience with AOSP and the AOSP build system.

Familiarity with modern app architectural patterns (MVP, MVVM, clean architecture).

Good knowledge of Android testing frameworks (JUnit, Espresso, Mockito).

Proficiency in Python scripting.

Expertise in version control tools such as Git.

Nice to have

Furthermore, it is meritorious if you have previous experience in Automotive infotainment projects. Also, there is a big advantage if you have a Swedish B driver's license.

Other

Languages

English: C1 Advanced

Seniority

Regular

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.
